channel.title: I need help with my server
channel.description: Hey, im almost done but i wanted to update it to have the fighting torso mini game. So i added the portal and added the first monster they fight but i cant figure out a way to get them to drop the approriate keys. Also i want to add barrows mini game so i need for them to drop random Barrows. And i also need the item id of the fighting torso mini game chest. Thanks alot, Cnr sport

item.title: I need help with my server
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

And all u gotta do for barrows is just like add a portal by doing GlobalObjects
then finding the co-ords u want it to go for barrows, going in NPCDrops for the random drops
and NPCHandler for them to respawn there

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with my server

item.title: I need help with my server

item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

Yeh…NPChandler to edit drops…In my source i have “NPCDrops”

item.title: I need help with my server
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

1 Thing, u can find the id urself on the moparscape v3.2 webclient, go to help, Item Ids, then type in the name
and click “Search”

Read full topic
